.then(()=>{console.log("SUCCESS!");setNotif(true);setMessage("Successfully Sent Email");form.current.reset();},error=>{console.log("FAILED...",error.text);setNotif(true);setMessage("Failed to send Email Please Try again");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-me",id:"contact-me",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Contact Me"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{ref:form,onSubmit:sendEmail,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"user_name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"user_email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"message",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"submit",value:"Send"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Notification,{trigger:notif,setTrigger:setNotif,message:message,duration:100})]});}export default ContactMe;
